last_episode_to_air.name: With Friends Like These
last_episode_to_air.overview: Max, Neil and Nikki have spent their summer forming friendships... OR HAVE THEY? What if it was all a lie? What if everyone actually hates them? Was any of it real?! Also David discovers social media and it goes exactly as well as you'd expect.

name: Camp Camp
overview: Three kids, Max, Neil and Nikki, spent the summer vacation at a dysfunctional campsite called 'Camp Campbell' which is currently in the hands the camp counselors, the overly cheerful David and the less optimistic Gwen.

episodes.name: Escape from Camp Campbell
episodes.overview: Max tries to take advantage of the bus dropping off new campers to Camp Campbell to mount an escape. Newcomers Nikki and Neil ask some important questions, and David tries to sing a song.

episodes.name: Mascot
episodes.overview: David takes the campers on a search for a new camp mascot. Max spends some quality time with the Quartermaster. Nikki and Neil encounter a dangerous wild animal.

episodes.name: Scout's Dishonor
episodes.overview: Max, Neil, and Nikki's latest attempt to escape Camp Campbell goes awry. Nikki returns to a terrible place. Neil adapts to a better way of life. Max is held prisoner.

episodes.name: Camp Cool Kidz
episodes.overview: The kids take control of Camp Campbell in a revolution led by Max. Nikki tries to impress Ered. Max and Neil must fight for their right to party. Campbell pays the camp a visit.

episodes.name: Journey to Spooky Island
episodes.overview: After a suspicious Quartermaster warns them not to, Max, Neil, and Nikki venture out to the mysterious Spooky Island to hunt for ghosts, but the kids get more than they bargained for.

episodes.name: Reigny Day
episodes.overview: Camp Campbell is visited by the Camp Critic Committee, and David is ready to impress them and win the prestigious (to him) Counselor of the Year Award. But when rain hits and all the campers are forced to stay in the mess hall, David must make new plans. Meanwhile, Nikki and Max search for Neil, who has gone missing.

episodes.name: Romeo & Juliet II: Love Resurrected
episodes.overview: Preston makes the kids put on a play. Max steals David's phone. The Flower Scouts stalk Neil, and David meets someone new.

episodes.name: Into Town
episodes.overview: David goes into town to blow off some steam, and the kids follow him to see what makes him tick. Neil gets a job. Max fears for his life when he sees David outside of camp.

episodes.name: David Gets Hard
episodes.overview: David enlists the help of Gwen and Max to toughen himself up for Nurf's behavioral correction camp. Will Nurf's deep-rooted issues prove to be too much for him?

episodes.name: Mind Freakers
episodes.overview: Harrison does a magic trick that Neil can't figure out. Desperately, Neil begins to do whatever it takes to find an answer.

episodes.name: Camporee
episodes.overview: The Campbell Campers are forced to compete in the Lake Lilac Camporee against their rival camps, The Wood Scouts and Flower Scouts. Pikeman makes a bet with Campbell. David tries to get the kids to work together.

episodes.name: The Order of the Sparrow
episodes.overview: In an attempt to get the kids in the camp spirit, David initiates them into a dated ritual called The Order of the Sparrow. When he promises the kids will get a prize, they jump at the opportunity to join. But what if the prize sucks?

episodes.name: Cult Camp
episodes.overview: Gwen puts out an ad looking for a new camp counselor, but is not happy with the results. Max suspects there is something off about the new hire.

episodes.name: Anti-Social Network
episodes.overview: Desperate to get some alone time with his computer, Neil makes a chatbot to distract the other campers. Things seems to be going smoothly until Nikki gets a little too attached...

episodes.name: Quest to Sleepy Peak Pea
episodes.overview: Nerris and Harrison pursue a date with destiny atop an active volcano. Which magic kid will save the day and vanquish the dark forces?

episodes.name: Jermy Fartz
episodes.overview: After making a misguided bet with the Wood Scouts, everyone at Camp Campbell is forced to be nice for a whole day. If that wasn't difficult enough, a new camper has just shown up and he's... a mess.

episodes.name: Jasper Dies at the End
episodes.overview: David reminisces a tale from his younger days back when he was a Campbell camper. When his fellow camper Jasper gets lost on a trek, it's up to young Davey to rescue him. Can he get to him before he's lost forever?

episodes.name: Quartermaster Appreciation Day
episodes.overview: After deciding Quartermaster deserves a day of appreciation, David reunites him with his quarter-sister, a distant relative who is not happy to see him.

episodes.name: Bonjour Bonquisha
episodes.overview: The campers try to help David with his relationship problems. Then the Flower Scouts try to help the campers help David with his relationship problems.

episodes.name: Gwen Gets a Job
episodes.overview: After Max discovers Gwen has been looking for a new job, he blackmails her into finding an elusive treasure. Gwen, desperate to not have David find out, is forced to play along.

episodes.name: Eggs Benefits
episodes.overview: The campers are tasked with taking care of some valuable platypus eggs but get so caught up in being parental figures that things start to go awry.

episodes.name: Space Camp Was a Hoax
episodes.overview: Space Kid is being more spacey than usual, and it's really annoying Max, Neil, and Nikki. Meanwhile, due to a legal loophole, David and Gwen are tasked with faking a moon landing for the would-be astronaut.

episodes.name: Cookin' Cookies
episodes.overview: The Flower Scouts' cookie sale is not going well, and if the girls are gonna win an all-expense paid trip to Cabo, they're gonna have to do some actual work. Ugh, the worst. So they try spicing up their cookies with a secret ingredient!

episodes.name: Parents' Day
episodes.overview: In the season 2 finale, David invites the parents of the campers to come visit. To Campbell's dismay, the future of the camp now hinges on everything going smoothly.

episodes.name: Halloween Special - NIGHT OF THE LIVING ILL
episodes.overview: An epidemic of illness is spreading throughout the camp, causing its victims to turn into snot-nosed zombies. It's up to the few kids spared to find a cure!

episodes.name: Holiday Special - A Camp Camp Christmas, or Whatever
episodes.overview: Everyone gets into the holiday spirit when a freak snow storm blows in. David tries to make it the best "holiday" for all the kids, while Max and Neil try to figure out why Nikki loves Christmas so much.

episodes.name: The Fun-Raiser
episodes.overview: When the funding for the camp runs out, David and Gwen have to come up with a way to save Camp Campbell from closing. So they steal the Quatermaster's hook hand and task the campers with comping up with fundraiser ideas to replace it.

episodes.name: Ered Gets Her Cool Back
episodes.overview: An uncool blunder has left Ered questioning her identity, so she tries to make up for it with a dangerous stunt with help from Nerris. Meanwhile, the other campers try out to be the new "coolest camper."

episodes.name: Foreign Exchange Campers
episodes.overview: Camp Campbell is visited by some foreign exchange campers, but something seems... off about some of them. What are they hiding? Why are they so interested in Cameron Campbell? Suspicious...

episodes.name: Nikki's Last Day on Earth
episodes.overview: After drinking an experimental tonic of Neil's creation, Nikki is suddenly not feeling well and is diagnosed with a case of Death. How will Nikki spend her last day alive?

episodes.name: Dial M for Jasper
episodes.overview: David is visited by the vision of an old friend. Max, Neil, and Nikki do some sleuthing to find out why David is so shaken up by the whole thing.

episodes.name: The Lake Lilac Summer Social
episodes.overview: The annual lake-wide dance is not going well, mainly because everyone attending hates one another. But when Neil starts crushing on Erin from the Flower Scouts, Gwen tries to play matchmaker between them, only to have it backfire horribly.

episodes.name: Cameron Campbell the Camp Campbell Camper
episodes.overview: Cameron Campbell has reappeared at the camp! Or rather, the new camper "Samboy Kidwell" sure looks like him anyway. He sure is acting funny -- almost like he has an ulterior motive or something?

episodes.name: Something Fishy
episodes.overview: At a run-down summer camp in the 2010s, a lonely camp counselor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that has emerged from the lake.

episodes.name: The Candy Kingpin
episodes.overview: Max forms an underground candy mafia after discovering Dolph has a huge box of sugary treats. Dolph wants a friendship instead of a business partnership, but Max is more interested in having power than a friend.

episodes.name: Operation: Charlie Tango Foxtrot
episodes.overview: The Wood Scouts take turns telling the tale of how they executed their latest and most ambitious plan to take over Camp Campbell to date.

episodes.name: City Survival
episodes.overview: Gwen and David need to go into the big city and are bringing the kids with them. When Max decides to show Neil and Nikki all the fun things the city has to offer, he breaks away from the group and it's up to David to track them down.

episodes.name: Camp Corp.
episodes.overview: With Camp Campbell sold off due to lack of funds, the campers are split up and sent off to the camps they intended to sign up for. Max is left alone, and with a decision to make.

episodes.name: Arrival of the Torso Takers
episodes.overview: After watching a spooky horror video, Max becomes increasingly concerned with David's behavior. Is Max just overreacting, or is there actually something wrong with David?

episodes.name: Culture Day
episodes.overview: It's Culture Day at Camp Campbell, and the kids find themselves drawn to Neil's Jewish ancestry. Neil gets carried away with the story of Hanukkah. Meanwhile, David tries to get everything ready for the big Culture Day feast!

episodes.name: Keep the Change
episodes.overview: While Cameron C. Campbell struggles to adjust to his new life of community service at camp, Max is determined to prove to David that Campbell is incapable of changing.

episodes.name: Attack of the Nurfs
episodes.overview: The camp gets a 3D printer, but things get out of hand when Nurf decides to print copies of... himself?

episodes.name: Who Peed the Lake?
episodes.overview: During a swim day at the lake, somebody has an accident and it's up to Max to find out who the perpetrator is.

episodes.name: New Adventure!
episodes.overview: Nikki has a wild series of adventures with an unexpected but supportive pair of campers.

episodes.name: The Quarter-Moon Convergence
episodes.overview: Quartermaster takes the campers out for Astronomy Camp, but clearly has ulterior plans for the night. Neil tries to take the lead and finds himself ill-equipped.

episodes.name: Follow the Leader
episodes.overview: Max, Pikeman, and Sasha are forced to work together to acquire a lost package for Campbell, putting their leadership skills to the test.

episodes.name: Preston Goodplay's Good Play
episodes.overview: Preston's new character is a hit with the entire camp, but finds their enthusiasm for more of it overwhelming.

episodes.name: After Hours
episodes.overview: The grown-ups deal with a variety of issues around the camp after the campers go to sleep. Mr. Campbell learns to handle some responsibility.

episodes.name: Camp Loser Says What?
episodes.overview: Camp Campbell falls to the Wood Scouts, whose new leader takes his agenda to extremes they might not be totally comfortable with.

episodes.name: Squirrel Camp
episodes.overview: The camp is overrun by vengeful squirrels, displacing the kids and counselors and forcing them to conceive a series of schemes to win the camp back from them.

episodes.name: Cameron Campbell Can't Handle the Truth Serum
episodes.overview: Campbell accidentally consumes a truth serum just hours before his parole officers are due to check in on his progress. Without the ability to lie, the campers help him find prove his efforts to become a better citizen.

episodes.name: The Forest
episodes.overview: David’s survival skills are put to the test when a canoe accident leaves him alone and stranded in the wilderness.

episodes.name: Campfire Tales
episodes.overview: The camp gathers 'round a campfire and shares some stories of varying spookiness.

episodes.name: Fashion Victims
episodes.overview: Oh emm gee, did you hear?!? Don’t tell anyone but Sasha is -like- freaking out over that new girl Ainsley. I think it’s cuz Miss Priss picked Ainsley’s idea for the new fundraiser or whatever and now Sasha’s all like scary crazy psycho mad. Anywaaaay, what are you going to wear to the fashion show!?!

episodes.name: Party Pooper
episodes.overview: Gwen's dad unexpectedly drops by camp for a visit, but his presence -- along with everyone idolizing him -- puts strain on Gwen and causes friction between the two. Also, dog.

episodes.name: Panicked Room
episodes.overview: Cameron Campbell finds himself trapped in a makeshift escape room with his most hated rival: Miss Priss! What steamy secrets lie in their shared history? Can they overcome their differences and escape?

episodes.name: The Butterfinger Effect
episodes.overview: Space Kid picks up a new hobby and the ripple effect is reaching further than Max is willing to admit. Can Max learn to deal with the aftermath or will he continue to deny the winds of change?

episodes.name: Time Crapsules
episodes.overview: Putting together time capsules gets the kids thinking about their futures, but after seeing Gwen not live up to her dreams, it paralyzes them with uncertainty. Meanwhile, Max tries to cheer Gwen up to expedite his transformation into a good person.

episodes.name: St. Campbell's Day - Holiday Special
episodes.overview: Cameron Campbell tries to get a new summertime holiday off the ground with help from the campers, but David suspects he has ulterior motives...

episodes.name: With Friends Like These
episodes.overview: Max, Neil and Nikki have spent their summer forming friendships... OR HAVE THEY? What if it was all a lie? What if everyone actually hates them? Was any of it real?! Also David discovers social media and it goes exactly as well as you'd expect.
